name: Bezuko's Brawl
description:
In the year 202X, Bezuko has been cursed; a curse that causes her to gradually lose her life until she perishes. She seeks out the Demon Lord to end her curse.

---

An action-adventure beat-em-up, created for the Illinois State University Game Development Club 2022 Winter Game Jam. 

The fourth and FINAL game in the Banjiro quad-rilogy from Banjiro Team!

---

Controls:

  • WASD to move!
  • LClick to BRAWL!
  • Space to jump and dodge!

---
